com.emc.vipr.client.core

Interface TaskResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the resource type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockConsistencyGroups, BlockExports, BlockFullCopies, BlockMigrations, BlockSnapshots, BlockVolumes, ComputeImages, ComputeSystems, FileSnapshots, FileSystems, Hosts, NetworkSystems, ObjectBuckets, ProtectionSystems, QuotaDirectories, StorageProviders, StorageSystems, Vcenters

    public interface TaskResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>
    Interface for resources that support tasks. The type of task/tasks returned are typed to the resource.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task<T> getTask(java.net.URI id, java.net.URI taskId)
      Gets a single task associated with a given resource by ID.
      Tasks<T> getTasks(java.net.URI id)
      Gets the tasks associated with a given resource by ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getTasks

        Tasks<T> getTasks(java.net.URI id)
        Gets the tasks associated with a given resource by ID.

        API Call: GET baseUrl/{id}/tasks

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        Returns:
        the tasks for the resource.

      • getTask

        Task<T> getTask(java.net.URI id,
              java.net.URI taskId)
        Gets a single task associated with a given resource by ID.

        API Call: GET baseUrl/{id}/tasks/{taskId}

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        taskId - the task ID.
        Returns:
        the task.
